resources:
muud Welcome to muud! Mindful tip of the day: Hydration can affect your mood: Make sure to drink enough water! Ready to log your mood? Let\'s go! About This is our mood-tracking app that we made for our HCDD 340 final. \n \n Made with love by Ben, Elyse, and John.
//activity mood strings How are you feeling today? How would you like to feel? Why do you think you feel this way? Anything else you'd like to share? Submit
